sentences: UNEP reported on its contributions to assist Parties in their implementation of Article 6.
The EU and SWITZERLAND highlighted the merit of an information clearing house.
The US said the clearing house should be user-friendly, cost-effective and developed through a phased approach.
Crispin dAuvergne (Saint Lucia) will chair a contact group on the issue.
enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
